content.detailedDescription: I was in a car going west back home on highway 14 from a few miles east of ault colorado and the highway curved to sw and that is when i started to see these light orbs and they looked like they were above greeley and we were about 45 minutes north of greeley so i assume that they were pretty far from the car. i noticed it because i thought it was a airplane but doesnt have blinking lights. i was on the passenger side in the front and thought that this was just an airplane at first but ten minutes later there were two bright white orbs hovering about 1000+ feet in the air then a third one appeared out of nowhere and then one started to dim so much that i could barley see it. this was right after sunset but there was still light in the sky from the sun. after a few minutes a fourth one appeared and then a fifth one but then it disappeared after a few seconds and it never came back. the remaining four just continued to hover and change color and altitude then one disappeared and there were three left. the highway curved again and went straight west instead and south west and i had a hard time looking at them so my little brother started watching them from the back seat and there were still three for another five minutes or so. then one of them started to go to a really low altitude, it looked like it was 100 feet from the ground or less but then again we were at least a mile or more away. the ufo that went to a really low altitude turned a dark reddish yellow and hovered there for a few minutes and we thought that it was picking somebody up. when i saw these ufos i was really excited and felt a rush even though we were at least a mile or more away and when i was trying to watch the really low altitude ufo i felt like screaming in joy because i knew it was not a plane because planes do not go that low. the low hovering ufo started to go back to a higher altitude and the glow changed back to a bright whitish-blue. then after a few minutes they started disappearing one by one first with two left over then one and then that one completely disappeared and we were back in fort collins by that time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was in a car watching it from far away and there were up to 5 light orbs dimming and brightening going up and down

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were watching television tuesday night after work when we started to hear a loud low rumble, like fighter planes. i immediately jumped off the couch and ran onto our 3rd story balcony, where i saw nothing but the sound was incredibly loud. i was scared we were being bombed or something. after 5 minutes or so of me and my girlfriend searching for what it was, we decided it was not a conventional plane departing from the airport within five miles of our house, but something we have never heard before, almost like a moan or scream of some kind. it sounded like jet planes were hovering above our apartment, i know that we arent the only people to hear this. i called keesler air force base at exactly 11:10(i have images from my phones call logs documenting the following) and informed them that there was a loud aircraft like noise hovering over our house, and that we were wondering if we should be worried or not. the man who picked up the phone said he would check and be right back. when he returned, he confirmed that there was nothing unusual going on in the area, and that he could connect me to the radar center if id like, so i agreed. the guy at the radar center said that he didnt show anything, but didnt even ask me where i lived? i was immediately transferred back to the original guy i spoke with, and when he informed me there is nothing else he could do, i said thank you and hung up. i know for a fact im not the only person that heard those noises, in gulfport that night. we live in an apartment complex!
content.summary: My girlfriend and i witnessed a very loud and unknown jetlike sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Object that appeared to be satellite, changed speed and course, then stopped and hovered. object split in two and departed

i took my dogs for a walk and was watching satellites fly over.

after viewing 5 satellites within an hour i returned home and went out back to have a smoke. i subsequently looked-up not expecting to see another object after 5 satellites in quick succession, and sure enough what first appeared to be a 6th satellite moving at variable speeds, then slowed, turned roughly 110 degrees to north and stopped then hovered at approximately orbit elevation for about 3 minutes before splitting in two and flying away in separate directions. i am a firm believer in a multitude of life forms existing, however this is the first unexplainable/unidentifiable object ive been privileged to see, awesome...

in addition, i did some research and realize that its not possible to see 6 satellites in less than an hour.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object that appeared to be satellite, changed speed and course, then stopped and hovered. object split in two and departed

content.detailedDescription:
Whatever this was 
5;45 am
it was loud and sounded like a jet flying low/fast and sounded like it circled back for a sec which if it was landing at the airport it would change direction alittle to line up with the runway.
it was startling to hear this in greeley.
i have seen the fighter jets and this was big whatever it was. i think it was a jet by the engine sound but no lights? 
was higher than treetop but still i would say below cloud cover.
it may bave been an 18 wheeler cause of our proximity to hwy 85. but the sound was different.
i am puzzled by this.
content.summary: Low flying jet?

content.detailedDescription:
It was may of our last year of high school and four of us decided to camp out for the weekend at kananaskis lakes, west of calgary alberta - an area familiar to me. kananaskis is now a well-known wilderness recreation area, but in the late '60's there was none of the development for which it is known today. 

the two lakes are separated by approximately 150 yards horizontally and 100 feet or more vertically. both have been dammed for power generation, so water levels fluctuate considerable from season to season and, even in mid-to-late spring, levels are usually still well down because meltwater has not yet replaced the water that has been used over the winter to drive generater turbines. i'm given to understand that present-day kananaskis lakes recreation area boasts many modern, well-serviced campsites, but for us, at that time,conditions were happily primitive.

when my traveling companion and i arrived in the early afternoon, two of our party had already set up their tent on the exposed beach next to the lower lake. we camped above them, nearer to the upper lake and next to the connecting sluiceway, about 50 feet east of the upper dam and somewhat lower than the dam in altitude, a position that would give us early-morning warming sun coming in over the lower lake. as we set up our tent that afternoon and also later as we hiked the north shore of the upper lake, we noticed a forestry helicopter flying up and down the kananaskis valley, passing within two miles of us, the sound of its motor and rotors echoing off of the surrounding mountains. 

around 6 to 7 o'clock we lit a fire, cooked an evening meal and, following that, got out our guitars to play and sing for a while. the scene, at this point, is vivid in my memory: 

i am sitting on a stump, looking beyond roger at an exquisitely picturesque mountain valley, the lower elevations of which are in shade, as am i. the other two members of my group are, like us, sitting beside their fire, 150 yards away from us, next to the absolutely still lower kananaskis lake. the west side of the valley, still in brilliant sunshine, is reflected perfectly in the lakewater. the silence is so profound that it seems almost wrong to mar it with our music but we do so anyway.

my friend has a guitar that is much more expensive that mine, so it shocks me when he drops it. it bounces off of something, probably his feet, and into the fire. i grab it quickly before it begins to burn, then look at him for an explanation. i see terror on his face,looking over my shoulder at something behind me. i step towards him, across the fire and turn, a guitar dangling from each hand (held by the neck), expecting to see a bear. i see nothing. i ask him "what did you see?" and "where is it?" but get no answer. to my left, i see him going into the tent.

i'm not frightened but i still don't see anything, so i stand still and look carefully into the shadows of the trees nearest us in the direction that my campanion had been looking, which is to the west, uphill, in the direction of the north shore of the upper kananaskis lake (which is over the dam and out of sight).

movement is what i'm looking for and that is exactly what gets my attention, but it isn't in the shadows, it is above the trees and visible against the clear sky, on the other side of the tree-tops. coming towards me but coming slowly. at this point, i'm beginning to comprehend that something is wrong but i can't get my mind to formulate a thought. my senses are acute and record details but my thought processes are very slow. it is as if there are two of me: one observing and another thinking. 

the me that is observing sees a silver-grey shape approaching and descending from beyond the trees at a speed that, in retrospect, appeared to be 15 to 20 miles/hour. it just clears the nearest tree-tops, which would put it at well under 50 vertical feet above the ground at that point but still 80 or more feet above me and 200 yards away (the trees are upslope from me). it continues to descent as it approaches me, but not at the same rate as the slope of the ground, so the object is 50 feet or so above me as it passes over me - not directly over me, but about 20 degrees or so off the vertical, so i'm viewing this object from below, at about a 70 degree angle and at a distance of from 50 to 60 feet (20 yards). it is still moving slowly.  there are what appears to be windows around the circumference of the object both on the main body and on the upper turret. there are also colored lights pulsing around the perimeter of the main body. movement is steady, silent and has a quality of lightness or fragility. the object continues on its path, passing over my companions on the beach and coming to rest less than 6 feet above the surface of the lake where it remains for 5 to 10 seconds in full view of at least one of them but neither of them seems aware of it. under the object, the glassy surface of the water is undisturbed.

simultaneously, two things happen: my thoughts return to normal with: "it's a ufo!" and the object shoots off at roughly a 45 degree angle into the clear blue sky and disappears into the distance in roughly one second, with no apparent acceleration. 

while all of that was going on, the other me (remember?)was struggling to think with a mind that was functioning like a swimmer in molasses:

"trying to identify this thing. helicopter? something's wrong. where's the noise? is it landing? what's wrong with it? not a helicopter? why don't the guys look up at it? what's wrong with them? what's wrong with the water? ............Its a ufo!" 

only the last three words were word-thoughts. all the rest were conceptual, non-verbal thoughts which i've put into words after the event. there was no emotion felt during the experience and no confusion, just what can best be described as a temporal duality: my thoughts and my physical experience just didn't match up.

 i remembering staring at the point of blue sky into which the ufo had disappeared and calling to my friend in the tent who'd left me with his guitar. when he didn't answer, i went into the tent feeling excited and wanting to talk about what had just happened. he was in his sleeping bag in mild shock and refused to talk. he just wanted to go home, which we did next morning, still without any discussion. i dropped him off at his home, and we haven't seen each other since that time.

the other two guys down on the beach neither saw nor heard the ufo though it passed only about 30 feet above them. their dog kept them up all night growling at something though.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Approached us treetop height passed close overhead descended to surface of lake. shot abruptly upward into bright sky and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been going thru videos at night and have many videos of ufo's by my house.
the one i am uploading is the closest one. i had to play it in 64x for space issues. you can see the time on the video at the top right.
at the end of the video you can see the reflection of the ufo overhead.
content.summary: Video i have pulled from my outside camera

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these same objects five times in the last 6 months. the first time there was only one of them. they always are going in the same direction. they are amber colored and not very bright. once, i saw a larger light that split into three lights as they continued traveling together at a high rate of speed. i kept telling my husband about them. he finally saw them too the last time i saw them. on that occasion there were two lights that seemed to join together and split apart several times as they traveled across the sky. there is never any sound associated with these objects and they move too quickly and oddly to be any sort of craft that is known to me.
content.summary: Two amber colored object that moved away from one another and back again quickly as the kept a steady ;ath across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from working all day in thousand oaks and traveling northbound on the 101 freeway in california.  i was driving along the stretch of freeway that is no more than 50 feet from the pacific ocean.  the view of the ocean and channel islands is completely un-ubstructed from houses or trees, but there was a terrific sunset with a marine layer creeping in on the horizon, so the channel islands were not as imedietly apparent like they would be on a clear day.
what drew my attention away from what i would ussually be looking at during this point of my freeway drive home(the great waves at rincon point) was a spiraling con-trail on the edge of the horizon that was in clear contrast compared to the milky sunset transpiring. cant remember if the sun was still up, but the time was right around 5:00pm pst and i wundered from where they were doing this launch, and did it fail or something? the trail cut off right where the marine layer stopped and there was nothing but clear skies above....So thats why i thought something must have gone wrong because i would have expected it to contiue and be connected to it's maker.  then all of a sudden at about a 45degree angle from my car window vantage point, i noticed a jet.  then i really noticed the jet, and how high in elevation, but how large at the same time it was.  nothing about this jet screamed ufo but it was hauling butt along the skyline and looked to be performing some slight s turns that looked very controlled. the contrails from the jet disipated very fast...Maybe 10-20 times the jets body length, but at the jet's tail i could tell these trails were extremely thick and seemed like a double or tripple width contrail and where a dark reddish color.  i thought this could be because of the orangy sunset going on.

as soon as the jet left my vantage point from my car driver side window which took 1or 2  minute tops, i started wundering if this was ejected from a sub,san nicholas island,or simply a plane coming over  the horizon from overseas.  thats when i noticed i noticed two very bright glowing balls that where about midway from the marine layer and the coastline, and maybe 1000 feet of the ocean level, or just about where i first noticed the jet(at 45degrees) the reason i was looking out there again and not trying to stretch my head out the window and keep watching the jet overhead was because i wanted to see the relationship of the trail to the islands to see if it could have come from our outer island san nicholas which is never visable from our shores,but i never made that calculation due to seing the bright glowing green balls which took all my attention.

i had to keep my eyes on the road, but my second look at the glowing balls gave me enough time to notice they were very slowly falling in the direction of the sea. not nearly as fast as a freefall would be, no matter what it's distance out to sea, or elevation could have been, so i'd say it was more of a slow deliberately decent.

the freeway took a sharp turn inland about this same time, and no longer offered the view i needed to keep viewing.

i did'nt react or feel like i thought i would given such an occurance...It almost felt like a normal everyday thing, especially when i started asking myself all the questions like "why did'nt you pull over?" "why did'nt you look longer?" "why did'nt i try to flag some other drivers down and point to the horizon and see if they saw it too?" "why did i not at least look at my car clock to find out the exact time?"(i always do that immedietly whenever something wierd happens) my only explanation for my lack of excitedness and panic is that maybe i thought the message i was seeing would mean something to me, or become more explosive visually, but it did'nt, or i was'nt able to watch it close or long enough due to the crazy trafic at the time.

i measured the distance of the freeway where i was seeing this on a mapping sevice and it was about 3 miles , and i was traveling around 75 to 80 mph and with the flow of traffic which was very congested, so potentially there are hundreds of people who if looking out at the ocean could not have missed the jet or the orbs
i hope this helps anyone who might have also seen this out there, and am very excited to see if there were some details or later happenings that i missed.
content.summary: Very high elevation jet with thick red contrails extemely fast followed by slowly falling green glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: It was a big round white light.. i seen it after a storm i was looking at the clouds when  seen a clear spot coming up.. when the clear spot came and i was able to see the sky .. i seen this white light moving there was nothing else in view not the moon and no stars just the black sky and this white light moving around .. i run in2 the house and got my camera i just started taking pics .. i was able to get 2 pics ... 1 shows the bright white light clear as day the other 1 shows it flying or moving away ..And the 3rd pic shows nothing .. it was gone and it took off fast with no sound at all.. not saying it was a ufo and i am not saying it was not a ufo .. im not sure what it was is why i am writing this ..
content.summary: 1 big round bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
Had just arrived at the city auditorium for a concert and was waiting outside to enter, when i looked up to see the full moon to the north, to the right of the moon was a very bright star and stringing out from the star was a string of 5 orange lights. i called for my friend to come see the orange lights and she noticed that they were moving, slowly toward the north. we could see then that the orange lights were below the star. the lights were spaced evenly apart and moved slowly and in tandem. after a few moments of watching, the middle one "faded" out completely, and the others contiuned on their northerly pathway, and it was at this time we looked to the right (south) and saw two addtional orange lights. they all continued on their northerly path and each light faded out one by one in a random pattern. 
this was a busy night downtown and many people saw this phenomena.
our personal reactions were surprised, curious and wondering just "what the heck" just happened.
content.summary: 7 glowing red-orange lights , moving south to north over town.

content.detailedDescription: While walking the dog outside tonight in our driveway, i was looking up at the stars as i always do.  i noticed the flashing lights of an airplane which are quite usual and frequent in this area.  almost immediately something moving caught my eye; something was moving very fast, westward.  it went from the trees on the east side of my driveway to the trees on the west side ... from the angle i viewed it approximately 1/4 mile in about 5 seconds.  it appeared very dark with no lights or marking that i could see -- it was almost like a shadow but was definitely something solid.  it may have been a meteor with a long tail high up enough so that it didnt appear meteoric in nature, but its hard to say.  from the appearance, it was solid, quite long, probably 500 to 1000 high (although that is very hard to tell at night under the stars) and moving very fast.
content.summary: Appeared to be long, large, very fast moving pointed cylinder

content.detailedDescription:
as we were driving hoime from church we were on an incline and could look down on our litte town situated in a valley. that is when we saw an object in the sky and it was lower than the rim of the hills behind it so we stopped the car and rolled down the window and told the kids to take a good look at the ufo because we probably will never see another one. we ( my husband and i)mentaly shook our heads and drove on home. the object was very dim  because of the time but still very clearly seen .It appeared to have light coming from the evenly spaced " windows" around  it.  when we got home we debated on calling the radio about it but didn't want to be put on the nut list..  we heard the next morning that 40 people had called in and saw what we had.


   then in 1992 i had a very weird experence on whidby island, washington that i won't go into now. very scary.
content.summary: Family coming home from church saw it , stopped the car rolled down windows and stared at it .Told kids to take a good look

content.detailedDescription: Sunday between 0915 and 0930 am myself and a friend observed a red tailed hawk circling above us screeching and acting erratically. the hawk was very verbal and raising her body to a point where she was stalling midair then she would recover and circle us once again. while watching this i commented to my friend that i had never seen a hawk act that way. he also said the same. looking at the hawk i saw two white dots racing along a a modest speed, roughly the speed of a say  f-4 phantom at twenty or thirty thousand feet, i say this because i have observed the latter and this experience i had a hard time judging the size of the obejects so i am at a best guess trying to guess size and altitude. both white round shapes flew in formation with each other for at least forty seconds. the object on the right took a ninety degree turn, excelerated and vanished. the object on the left continued straight for at least two to four seconds and vaninshed in a straight line both objects were on a northwest heading. i asked my friend what the hell is that, do you see those, he replied yes, he said i don't know. we had some more what the hell are they comments and then we both said where did it go? we turned and looked back almost straight up and looked for the hawk, my friend said where the hawk go, i said it was right there, but it was gone. both of us looked at the sky around us and i said to my friend look theres five more of those. i asked him are the gulls from the river and he said he thought that they were to high. i said to him why would birds glint sun light like a mirror, he said he didn,t think they were birds. as this conversation was happening we were observing the five white objects, identical to the first two in shape, size and altitude. they were flying in a five star formation, same speed and unequal distance from each other, not a tight or precise formation. they flew twoard us on a northwest heading. we observed them for twenty to forty seconds, when they started to circle each other some turning left some right. they did advance forward in their flight path at the same speed for maybe ten seconds, prompting me to ask my friend if he thought they were birds. his response was no and that birds don't shine like a mirror. all five objects then resumed their original formation and continued northwest on the same path as the first two, excelerated and vanished from right to left. we both looked at each other and laughed, i asked my friend was that strange or what. he said we probably ought not to tell anybody as they would think we had started drinking. i am a retired army aviator and have many experiences in aviation, flying and aerodynamics. i don't know what i saw but i can tell you after careful consideration they were not gulls or any other type of birds. the hardest thing i find myself struggling with is at what altitude and what size and speed were they traveling. thank you, brian
content.summary: Seven round white objects viewed at altitude and moderate to high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Walking the dog before the storm moved in.  noticed a bright star change color to amber then began to move west.  retrieved family member to witness also then we counted at least 30 more star-like objects approaching from the east moving slowly to the west, without a definite pattern, some trailing behind others, some traveling in a triangle formation. when a plane passed by, some of the objects nearest to the plane dimmed, then brightened significantly after the plane passed (also moving west).
camera wouldnt work, too dark for video.  event happened for approx 1/2 hour, then storm clouds began to block ability to see event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over 30 starlike objects moving from east to west just before storm clouds moved in from the west

content.detailedDescription: Something walks around our town outside the lights and has been crying for over a month to fast to be an animal next a light was witnessed flying up into the sky from where the crying was coming from
content.summary: Crying beast, ufo sited in area

content.detailedDescription: It was about 6:10 pm jan. 16th 2012 over grass valley ca.  three lights were hovering over the town.  they moved around slowly and faded in and out.  two of the lights were close together and one was further away from the others.  the two that were close together would move around each other.  i have scene lights like these before over santa rosa ca.
content.summary: Three lights that moved around up down left right faded in and out
Four simlar sightings at same site in 2010, and two more 2011.

content.detailedDescription: Stavo passeggiando nel parco del mio quartiere con il mio cane quando ho sentito il rombo di un aereo che si abbassava di quota e ho notato che iniziava ad emettere delle scie a forma di semicerchio l'una accanto all'altra. era un grosso aereo di quelli noti che rilasciano le scie chimiche persisteni nell'aria ed improvisamente e' stato inseguito da due dischi volanti apparsi vicino. questi dischi hanno iniziato a girare intorno al velivolo e mentre compivano queste evoluzioni scomparivano e riapparivano piu' volte; erano bianchi luminosi quasi trasparenti, si spostavano in formazione ed erano capaci di apparire e scomparire continuamente. dopo neanche un minuto sono scomparsi e l'aereo si e' allontanato.
content.summary: Due dischi rotondi di luce, quasi trasparenti che apparivano e scomparivano durante le evoluzioni.

content.detailedDescription:
This was a terrifying event for me. i contacted a relative when i got home in the middle of the night and she got me the name of someone here in spokane who supposedly "handled ufo incidents". when i called him he asked me what happened and when i started to tell him he said, "yeah right, so you were chased by lights". and then he hung up on me. so, i have been very reluctant to speak to anyone of authority regarding this event. here i am, 10 years later, ready to tell anyone who wants to listen. i didn't realize this forum existed or i would have reported this event sooner.

on approximately august 31, 2002, i was traveling back from portland, or to my home in spokane wa. i had gone back to pick up some items i had not brought with me during my move from portland to spokane. 

the main hwy leading into spokane from portland is 90 and i believe it changes into 2 at some point. i was approximately 30 miles (i would have to go back there to be absolute on this) outside of spokane when this incident occurred, driving in my car, alone, and wide awake. there are huge "boulders" on the immediate right side of the hwy. the boulders are really what the hwy is carved through. it's more like a "wall" of rock to the right side of the left lane going straight up approximately 20 ft. i would have to go back there to be more accurate on that. 

as i came around a little bend in the hwy my attention was drawn to the top of the boulders on the left side. there was a huge object just laying on the top of the boulders, almost sideways.The predominant lights i remember were white, red and blue. there were many circles of round lights flashing sequentially with smaller circles of light traveling in the opposite direction within those circles. i was traveling at a speed of approximately 60mph so i couldn't stop but my first thought was, "what kind of roadwork is being done here in the middle of the night?..And on a boulder?" as i look back it seems my mind was trying to place the object into a framework or context i could understand. 

with in a couple seconds after passing that place in the hwy where i had looked up to see the object, i saw 3 white lights in my rear view mirror. one of them traveled quickly to the back of my car, about 4 ft off the ground and i thought at first it was a motorcycle traveling at a high rate of speed that was going to crash into the back of my car. as soon as it reached the very back of the car it just "blinked" off as though someone had turned the light off. at the same time there were 2 other lights the same size traveling just as quickly to the left and right hand sides of the car but when they reached the back door level, the one on the left side, or the boulder side, just seemed to go straight up the boulder. the one on the right side did the same thing but as there are no boulders on the right side it just flashed off to the right and blinked off.

they were basketball size and shape, maybe a little larger. there was absolutely no sound at all. i didn't have the radio on and my window was partially open as i like fresh air when i drive. the one light that came up behind my car did so several times. i was watching it and them in my mirror, my side mirror and over my shoulder. every time they would start someways behind me and then travel so quickly towards the back of the car i was sure they would crash into me but they never did. i realized they were not motorcycle lights. motorcycles cannot travel up a boulder or off the left side of the highway or almost hit the back end of my car repeatedly and then just disappear.

i was utterly panicked. i felt like a rabbit being chased by wolves that were toying with me. there were no other cars traveling on that hwy during this time which lasted approximately 7-8 minutes. i didn't know what to do other than speed up and try not to crash my car as i couldn't take my eyes off them because i really believed something bad was going to happen to me.

then further down the hwy i saw a semi pulled into a gravel "pit-stop" nestled into the boulders on the right side of the road. i passed the truck and pulled in front of it skidding to a stop to ask for help. when i opened my car door and tried to get out i literally fell down to my knees and screamed "motorcycles are chasing me" to the driver of the semi who was standing in front of the truck. i simply didn't know what else to say because how could i explain what i saw. i must have looked so terrified that i actually scared him because he wouldn't approach me. he looked back down the hwy as i did and there was absolutely nothing coming. no lights, no cars, nothing. i told him, when i could get up, that i was trying to get home to spokane and he said to follow him and he would honk his horn at the the maple st. bridge exit. i knew how to get there, it was just a few minutes on the same road but i didn't want to be on that road alone. so i followed him and kept watching for those lights in the mirrors and over my shoulder but they simply never appeared again.

a couple days after the incident my mother located a retired air force colonel in the spokane area who had been involved somehow in the ufo community. i do not recall his name. (he was not the same person i reached  to report this incident to, who hung up on me.) i called him and we had a couple conversations. he told me he was well aware of ufo sightings by the air force when he was active and also, that people routinely called the police in the area that this incident occurred with reports of strange lights. when i called the police to report seeing lights, just to hear their response, i was told no one had called in a report about anything like that on that evening or any other evening so i don't know if what he said was the truth or if the police were telling the truth. 

so i have sat with this incident over 10 years now and have told just my mother, 2 friends, the colonel and the other person who hung up on me. 

i know what i saw and what i experienced. no one can take that away from me. this was not something i can find any explanation for other than i actually saw a ufo sitting on the boulders and then 3 lights came out of it and chased me for some reason. i have joked to my friends and mother that i was not interesting enough for them to take me. thank god for that!!!!

i have recounted this incident as clearly as i can. the images of the large object on the boulders and the 3 lights are burned into my memory like it happened last night. thank you for this forum.
content.summary: on hwy 90 passed large object w/flashing lights sitting on top of boulders on left of car, then pursued by 3 "lights"  basketball sizedfor several miles

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were driving from my house to another friends house at approx. 11 p.M. we started to come to a main road in which we saw a large circular shaped object above the treeline. as we started to stop the vehicle object then took off one direction and then changed direction at a very fast pace. when it changed direction it stayed at an angle and then slowed down speed and stayed moving above treeline. we then arrived at a friends house where another friend of ours came along with us to see if we could get another sighting. the last sighting we saw approx. an hour to two hours later was three objects in the sky with a formation that looked like orions belt and then they split off in opposite directions.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Circular object above treeline hovering then stopped car to take a look, object then started moving away from our location

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving northbound on i-25 and around 5-6 pm, when i saw a triangle of three red lights, two of which were blinking, above the freeway seeming to be moving east to west. it was absolutely silent. there were no other identifying markers lights or patterns like a helicopter or any other type of aircraft ive ever seen, and i work near the sun port. at first i didnt believe what i was seeing, but i kept my eye on it as best i could whiole driving on the freeway at 70. i lost sight of it as i followed the freeway into a gentle left turn. ive checked with a pilot friend of mine and he says it doesnt sound like anything hes ever seen, and hes flown just about everything with wings. if anyone else in albuquerque saw that thing, early evening on january 12 th, please hit me back. oh yeah, koat channel 7 news, reported people saw a a meteor in their 10pm broadcast, hah.
meteors dont have blinking lights on them...Ive seen meteors!

today, january 17th, 
i saw on you tube, that someone had videoed the object, same day same time.
content.summary: Three red lights, 2 blinking, one steady never blinking.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i reported this event to uk-ufo sightings web site (www.Uk-ufo.Co.Uk) a few hours after the event, it is best i copy and paste my description to provide the most accurate description of the events instead of trying to recount all the details some 2-3 months after:

ok id just dropped my daughter off at her martial arts class and had returned home, i made a cup of tea and stepped outside the back door of my house to go across the garden in to my summer house to have a smoke and drink my tea. knowing that yesterday and today theres supposed to be a spate of meteor showers i happened to glance up at the night sky, a split moment later i noticed a group of objects to the left of me, my brain at first interpreted them as meteors but they werent - in the split second after i initially saw them, i knew full well they were not meteors, or chinese lanterns, birds or planes - there was approx 6-7 vehicles - not illuminated, silent and approx 60ft in the air in a tapered formation, they were travelling fairly quickly and made no sound at all, there appeared to be no moving parts, lights or anything else, they were a cross between gun metal and silver-ish in colour - although due to their speed and it being dark at the time, i wasnt able to identify any other distinguishing features. they looked roughly the size of a car - maybe a bit bigger and stayed in their tapered formation during the event.

it shook me up and im still affected now some 3 hours later. i explained this to my partner and broke down in tears, i dont know why - all i can recount is a mixture of being totally scared out my skin and excitement. even now recounting this event i am in tears. i am a grown man (nearly 40) and work a professional job - ive seen my fair share of anomalies - this however seemed like it was right out of a science fiction movie. 

poster had asked:

du think you may may be abducted too?

could you possibly describe the shape of the objects, were they all the same shape?


to which my reply was:

no  i had no recall on missing time, the only thing i can say is ive had a bad headache for a few days since, but i have suffered with headaches all my life so its nothing new to me- but other than that, nothing else.
 
as to the shape  i will give a few descriptions, to help build a picture,
 
you know those egg sacks you get in seaweed? well cut one out and leave a bit of an edge and sort of like that.
 
kind of like  i know this is a common comment, but it looked domed shaped at the bottom with a outer lip around the middle.
 
they appeared to have a dark rim/lip and the dome shaped underside appeared to be almost self luminescent  grey/dark  maybe reflective  im not sure why the underside appeared to be brighter in colour than the edges.

yes, they were all the same size, they all looked exactly the same as each other in size, shape, etc


--------------------------------------------------------------------------

since the event i have been heavily drawn into the subject of ufo's - i have watched thousands of hours of interviews, documentaries, etc and i have also studied thousands and thousands of still images.  i have been able to update the posting i made above after watching an interview with bridget grand by nick pope - her descriptions of the objects are very similar indeed - in fact it helped me recall something i hadnt thought anything of at the time of my incident and so i have also pasted below my subsequent comment:


it has been a while since my sighting  looking back on the experience i had, i didnt think anything of it at the time  the colour of the underside of the crafts  i just assumed it was orangey in colour due to the reflection of the streetlights  i have since seen an interview with bridget grant (interviewed by nick pope) and she describes exactly the same ships (in la  usa)it was when she said it had the same colouring that i had seen  could this be the same craft? she didnt have a picture of it, but like me she had since been through a lot of pictures of ufos  she chose ones that looked like what she had seen  these can be seen in the interview  these look just like what i saw  only there was more than one and it didnt hover around  the ones i saw flew almost overhead at speed (fortunately).


--------------------------------------------------------------------------

now present day (17-01-12) i am infatuated with looking up at the sky - my normal routines have gone, i now spend my evenings researching this subject, trying to find a rational explanation - many years ago the triangular shaped craft that was doing the rounds in the 1990's (i reported on here some years later) flew right over my head at low level - like just above my friends house on a clear sunny day- this craft, although very odd looking - perfect triangle, matt black colour, one white/yellowish round light in each corner and two small red lights in the center, craft made audible rumbling as it passed overhead slowly - this i could rationalise - as i could see clear as day, panels, bolts, etc (no actual markings/writing) - using basic logic, i determined it to be terrestrial as i reasoned that if an extraterrestrial craft came, they would be advanced enough not to be using nuts and bolts - aka my reasoning it to be terrestrial - the event in november last year however, i cannot explain.
content.summary: 6-7 aerial vehicles flew very quickly over head

content.detailedDescription: I will be so exited when i see an aliene
content.summary: Ilike to have informationufo

content.detailedDescription: Im a freelance photographer and have been for 30 years now and i was going outside to take some pics of the sky about 3 months ago because it was a beautiful day but when i got to my back yard i saw something i didnt know what it was. so i started taking pics of it. i have had allot of sightings since i was very young. when i was 8 and my brother was 9 we where both walking down a country road when the whole sky turned white over us. the next thing we remember is running home as fast as we could. 2hours had passed and we where only 100 feet from our house. we never knew what happened to us that day. i also have a photo of a ufo over palmdale california as well. for some strange reason i have been drawing and writhing things down for a year now about humans and life here on earth. im going to write a book about the human code and our origins. can someone please help me understand whats going on?
content.summary: I went outside to take some photographys and when i got to my back yard there it was about 30 feet away hovering

content.detailedDescription: I have a fleet of ufos following me for years. i have witnesses and their phone numbers. these crafts that's been following me can be sighted on clear night sky's. for the past six months i have a group of ufo hunters that we sighted a fleet of ufos flying over our ufo meetup group in new york city. i am now pursuing an investigation of two ufo fleets in the vicinity of new york city. anyone interested to view the fleet that been following me for years can get in touch with me. i will get in touch with a mufon investigator and show him the video of the ufo flying over new york city. then i will show him the fleet that's been following me for years in a panoramic view of the sky to see this complete fleet.
content.summary: I have a fleet of ufos following me for years and also sighted a second fleet of ufos over nyc

content.detailedDescription: On january 3rd at about 6:45 p m my wife came home from work and as she shut our gate she noticed a large lite hovering over our field. she proceeded down our driveway to about half way to our house and stopped her car and cut the engine and lights and got out to see if this light was making any noise which it wasn't and watched as it hovered towards our house. she drove to the house and came in to tell me that i needed to check out this weird light that she had seen. i went out without shoes or a coat and by that time the light had moved behind our house and looked to be about a half a mile behind the house and it was hovering behind the trees in our back yard. this evening was extremely clear with the moon being full or almost full with no clouds visable. i watched the light for a while and went in to get a coat and shoes and came back out to watch the light again which hadn't moved in about 10 to 15 minutes. i asked my wife to get my spotlight which she did and i blinked it three times at this light and the light dimmed down to where it almost disappeared and then lit back up to the original size. my wife told me not to blink the spotlight at it since it may come back and i told her i wanted it to come back so i could get a better look at it and she said she was going in the house which she did.At that time i moved farther into out back yard to try to get a better view of the light and i blinked the spotlight at the hovering light again and it dimmed down again and lit up again just as before. about this time a large dark shadow went over head which caused me to jump and sart to move towards the house and at that time my wife opened our back door and told me again not to blink my light at the light object. i told her to get her car keys so we could follow this thing to get a better look at it and to try to dertermine the distance. she didn't want to but she reluctantly got her keys and we started to follow this light and as we left our driveway her dash in her car started to make rattling noises and i jokingly told her if we were ufo freaks we would think the light was messing with her car and she stated that it hadn't made that noise before. we watched and followed this object for 4 mile and made a right turn to head in the direction of the light and we came to a red car heading in our direction, but parked on the other side of the road with a man standing behind it looking up in the sky in the direction we were coming from and i told her to stop but she wouldn't. i looked at this guy as we passed and he seemed to be zoned out with a blank look on his face and he never looked at us as we past him just kept looking up. we stopped at a stop sign about 100 yards past this guy and i got out to look back to see what he was looking at but saw only the moon and stars and the light object was still ahead of us. we watched the light for a few minutes and then the car came up behind us and we made another right turn to try to get closer to this light and this car followed us a little way and then turned off. we went around a right turn and a cayote ran across the road which she thought was a dog but i told her it was a cayote.We travel another 2.4 miles and came to another bend in the road to the right and this light object was above a two story white house with a black roof facing us.This house was in a field that looked to be at least 150 yards from us.Now this house was well lit from the bright moonlight and this light object was behind the house and to the left of it hovering just above the tree line.She stopped the car in the turn and i told her to move up just in case anyone came up behind us but she said that she could see if anyone came in the mirror.We watched the light and i got my spotlight and blinked it at the light three times and again it dimmed down but this time we must have been closer because as it dimmed down it changed into a blue white ring and i looked into the center of the ring and with the moon light shining down i saw a oval disk in the center of the ring and i asked her if she was seeing this and she said she was.At that time the ring blinked out and we couldn't see it. i said that that mother f'er blinked out and was gone and just as i finished the statment it lit up again to the far right side of the house and was at a farther distance. we followed this light for about another mile and a half to a hill top and watched the light object move over the trees towards the route 208 bridge over lake anna. my wife said she was tired and wanted to go home so we turned around and proceeded home after travel a few miles i looked out the back window of the car and the object was in the center of the rear window and joking agian i told her that this thing was following us and we went a little farther and i looked again and could still see it and i remembered thinking that i was glad we were getting close to the main road.We turned on the main road and went home without seeing the object again.As we entered our house i looked at the clock and thought it's 10 minutes to eight.My wife went upstairs and i went back to watching tv. she came down a little later and we spoke breifly about the strange sighting we had had. over the next couple of days i felt strange but didn't think alot about it.I asked a few associate that live in the area if they had seen the light objject and none had but another associate had seen this light object about a month before and four of them watched it for an hours as it slowly hovered out of sight. i checked for reports of the sighting but found none.We got busy that week and weekend but the next week i kept thinking about this object and on the night of the sighting i had asked my wife how far she thought we had followed this thing and she said about 4 miles,so on my way home january 11th i decided to run the route and check the mileage.I followed the route and and it was about 4 miles to where we saw the guy looking up in the sky behind his car and i turned right at the stop sign and past where the cayote had crossed the road and travel to the right hand bend in the road and looked to my left for the field and house but there wasn't a 150 yard field or house so i figured that it must be a little farther down the road but from there on there is no more fields on the left or any houses that looked like the one i saw that night. i travel the road twice thinking i had missed it but it's not there. i asked my wife what the house looked like and she stated that it was a large house light in color with a dark roof and i told her it wasn't there and that i wanted her to drive there with me. on sat. the 14th in the late afternoon we drove to the site and i watched as she remembered where the guy was and where the cayote was and as we approched the right hand bend she stated that this was the spot and as we came around the bend she was as shocked as i that there isn't a two story white house there, there is a small clearing with a horseshoe driveway with the main diveway in the center going back to a tree farm. there is no 150 yard field or house but she stated that the hardwood tree line was the same. where we saw the field is full on 20 to 25 ft pine trees that cover about 150 yards to the hardwood tree line.I asked her what she thought and she stated that that was very strange.We headed home and i asked her about the sighting which we hadn't discussed in detail before which now seems strange since it was so unusal.I asked her if she remembered me asking her if she was see this and she said yes and i asked what she saw and she said she saw a blue light as the bright light dimmed down. i asked her if she had seen the oval metalic craft in the center of the ring and she said no, but she stated that she had told me to get back in the car and i told her i hadn't gotten out of the car and she said that when she told me to get back in the car i told her that i was trying to get out of the light. as she said this i remembered standing in front of her car facing her headlights and trying to block the lite with my arm. i had no memory of this until she made the statement.We both saw the house and field that night as well as the light object but we have no explaination as to why it's not there now. if this isn't our military equipment then it's from somewhere else. i did finally find another report of the light object that the reporter said turned into a donut shape on january 6th which was three nights after our sighting.On two trips to this sight while trying to remember everything about the sighting i have gotten a dull headache which takes about 15 minutes to go away. maybe the other reporter of this sighting is having the same issue.I'm like everyone else i've read reports like this and though they were interesting i wasn't 100% believing in them. but after having this experience i can understand how it sounds so unreal and why the facts don't relate totally to their experience. whatever this thing was had the ability to alter our perception of reality and to cloud our memory of the event. i focused that night to remember all the details as possible as we were viewing this sighting but it still had the power to fool us into see a field and house that aren't there.This is the truth as we saw it and we can't explain it!
content.summary: Hovering star like light that changed into a blue/white ring with oval disk in the middle cusing us to see a house that isn't there

content.detailedDescription:
While going out for a smoke at 4:45 am jan 16, 2012 i spotted a very bright, flickering star-like object approximately 15-20 miles to my north hovering est 3000 ft, depending on size. due to it's brightness and changing intensity i knew it wasn't a star. there are no other visible stars in that section of sky at that time. however, i waited until now just to make sure it wasn't there again today before filing this report.

i stayed out for about 20 minutes keeping an eye on it. it varied in intensity the whole time. at it's brightest it almost took on a shape similar to (only thing i can think of) the capitol bldg in d.C. that was very vague though due to it's distance. because it was so cold i went back inside, peeking out the front door occasionally to make sure it was still there. went back out around 5:20 and watched it for another 10 minutes. i had noted a location my 1st time out, above a tree across the street. the 2nd time out i saw that it had drifted slightly north above the next tree in the same front yard. about an inch worth if holding a ruler up. it had gone in a perpendicular direction to the rotation of the rest of the night sky.

rather than twinkling like a star, it flickered quickly and constantly changed it's intensity. there were no other aircraft visible the whole time and it was a cloudless sky. since it was so cold and i was getting sleepy (and wanted to see the end of the longest day on tv) and it didn't seem to be in a hurry to go anywhere, i gave up watching and eventually went to sleep.
content.summary: Flickering bright star-like object hovering for 45 minutes observed

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 8:30 pm on 1/16/2012, i was walking my normal route near a neighborhood mixed with houses and industrial/commercial buildings. as i rounded a corner i saw a bright blue light, i thought it was a helicopter at first, but it proceeded to make a tight circle, as it did the single blue light would make a "half circle" appearance (i assume the light was on the other side). as soon as the blue light completed its circle it made a sudden drop straight down and then stop. it did the rotation and drop two more times before i lost sight of it behind trees. i observed this for about 5-7 minutes. i could not see the outline of the craft or hear any noise, i also couldn't judge how large it was or how far away it could have been. i was looking almost due west from the cypress, ca area towards long beach, ca. i was probably less than a mile from the los alamitos joint forces training center, los alamitos, ca.
content.summary: Bright blue light rotating from a fixed spot, creating a half circle of light. when rotation complete would drop straight down and stop and repeat total of 3 times before i lost sight.

content.detailedDescription: time of sighting 11.45 pm january 15 2012" i witnessed an object descend rapidly from above 5000 feet roughly and brighten. it suddenly leveled off and slowed to almost a hover. then 2 smaller orbs began to move around and come into view. the 2 smaller orbs maneuvered around the larger object. the larger object maintained a fairly straight course moving slowly at roughly a mile away. it was between 1 and 2 thousand feet in altitude. all three objects suddenly and rapidly ascended and vanished. the larger one dimmed out as it ascended fading momentarily into a dim blue before completely vanishing.The entire event lasted for a few minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saucer or orb with short wings, accompanied by 2 smaller orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7 pm yesterday, january 15, 2005, i was taking out the trash and noticed an extremely bright light in the sky.  it was brighter than any stars or planes in the area.  i called my wife and we watched it for about 10 minutes before grabbing our cameras.  we ended up watching the object and taking pictures for about 40 minutes or so.  we live close to the atl international airport and several times planes were pretty close to the object.  after looking at our pictures and video we noticed the object was disc shaped.  at the time the object appeared to change shape.  around 7:40pm the object dimmed and slowly moved out of site.  it was a very interesting experience.  we arent sure what we saw  we love going to air shows and are used to the air traffic in the area.  this was definitely out of the ordinary.

i used a canon 50d and my wife used a nikon d90
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disc like object observed in the sky for about 40 minutes before dimming and leaving the distance.
